price: Kuma dã Munã so, dã lalle Mun nũna maka su. To, lalle kanã sanin su game da alãmarsu. Kuma lalle kanã sanin su ga shaguɓen magana, alhali kuwa Allah Yanã sanin ayyukanku.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيۡنَٰكَهُمۡ فَلَعَرَفۡتَهُم بِسِيمَٰهُمۡۚ وَلَتَعۡرِفَنَّهُمۡ فِي لَحۡنِ ٱلۡقَوۡلِۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

translations: surely, We could show them to you
but surely, you will know them
